content:
Welcome to Buildmate - Estimating made simple

Tutorial :- Let’s get you estimating

Add your first Customer. Click the Customers link above to begin.

Tutorial: Let’s get you estimating

Create or Add your first project. Click the Projects link above to begin.

Select your Project

With your Customers in place the next step is understanding more about your Project

Click the flashing Projects link above.

Select your Project

With your Customers in place the next step is understanding more about your Project

Click the flashing Projects link above.

Select your Project

With your Customers in place the next step is understanding more about your Project

Click the flashing Projects link above.

Select your Project

With your Customers in place the next step is understanding more about your Project

Click the flashing Projects link above.

Managing your Suppliers

Now that you've added your first Resource, it's important you understand how Suppliers work.

Click the flashing Suppliers link above to begin.

Your Suppliers

Now you've succesfully updated Your Company click the Supplier link above to add a New Supplier.

Managing Resources

Now that you've setup some Suppliers lets link your Resources to your Suppliers.

Click the Resources link above to begin.

Congratulations!

You have now successfully completed all areas of the Buildmate Tutorial and should now have everything you need to get started.

For further help or assistance please visit our Knowledge Base or you can request help using our Support page.

Start Estimating..
